name: HSLNextTransit
0:
”Alexa, open Helsinki transit”
”When the next one leaves?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: helsinki transit
des: Finds out when next public transportation goes on nearest stop based on HSL open API (digitransit.fi). Works only where digitransit.fi provides routes. At the moment destination is set to Kamppi, Helsinki.
